reviews.review:
Portal Is A Puzzle Game With Lots Of Level And Workshop Map
You Can Play It Solo Or Co-Op With Friend And Have A Great Time
I Truly Recommend This Amazing Game.
One if the best games ever made. And thats fact. My favorite game for years now. Good written, entertaining and funny.

Portal 2's co-op is pretty fantastic in that it is a completely different experience than the single player, in every aspect. The story is different, the characters are new, and the puzzles are two-player required. While many games that feature co-op, if they even bother, just toss both players together in the single player campaign, that would have been disastrous with a puzzler like Portal 2. So major props to Valve for developing this campaign, just for us.

The Portal series of games is a series of puzzles that are solved using spatial portals.
By and large, Portal 2 is still the same Portal only with the nuts twisted. All the advantages of the first part are present in the sequel - great music, eye-pleasing graphics, interesting humor

Great game! My favorite game at the moment because of how much content is has for you to enjoy over time. I thought it would be like portal 1 being able to beat the game in one sitting but this game has a lot more content and has more features that aren't in the first portal game! Would recommend!
good game, liked black mesa facility better tho
arguably the best puzzle game of all time for a reason paced perfectly, hilarious dialogue and many twists and turns what more could you want?
awsome realistic physics and is overall has an interesting story!
Valve's 2nd most recent full game made by them. Hopefully becomes 3rd most recent soon. :)
i don't have any friends for the co-op :(

Completamente recomendado es muy divertido, tiene muchas mas horas de juego que el primer portal, y pasar por las antiguas instalaciones de Aperture es lo mejor que he hecho en algun videojuego en mucho tiempo

--- One of the best games I have ever played ---

I had an absolute blast playing Portal 2 - and I'm sure everyone else has. It does make you think, so it isn't too easy, but that isn't really why I love it. I love it because, well, it is fun. The game actual feels like it is made to be enjoyed - with great jokes everywhere and not overwhelming you with new mechanics. The game introduces new mechanics to you slowly, and so that they make sense. The return of GlaDOs is incredibly welcome, but the new character of Wheatley is probably what makes me love this game so much. "What you just did there is jumped."

So yeah, if you haven't already... PLAY THIS GAME!
Wowzers this is one of the best games i have played' i finished it 4 times now, and it wasn't even boring replaying the whole thing a day after beating it! really reccomend
Pretty cool game, especially in coop

It's pretty good but it can be very laggy

This game is a Masterpiece. Definitely one of the best video games ever.
I've played for more than 100 Hours and still have a lot of fun. The main story is awesome but the Co-Op is simply perfect and haven't found a single bug after all this time.
Best money i ever spend.
Congrats to the team and the community who keeps creating new maps.
best game I've ever enjoyed playing co-op
